Creates an HTTP based Web Service connector project to invoke a remote REST web service, by importing its SWAGGER description file. { "url": "template_HTTP=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-template-http/archive/7.9.0.zip", "doPage1": true, "doPage10": true }

Creates an HTTP based Web Service connector project to invoke a remote SOAP web service, by importing its WSDL description file. { "url": "template_HTTP=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-template-http/archive/7.9.0.zip", "doPage1": true, "doPage10": true }

The user manager library handling user/password or OpenID / OAuth single signons. { "url": "lib_UserManager_ui_ngx=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-user-manager-ui-ngx.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }
Imports the Convertigo Sigfox library project. { "url": "lib_Sigfox=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-sigfox.git:branch=7.9.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

This is the SAML 2.0 Authentication library for Convertigo platform. Install this library to enable SAML 2.0 SSO to your Convertigo applications. { "url": "lib_SAML_ui_ngx=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-saml-ui-ngx.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }
Imports the Convertigo Salesforce library project. { "url": "lib_Salesforce=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-salesforce.git:branch=7.9.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

This is the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) Push notifications library for the Convertigo Low Code Platform. This library brings the server part and the client part for Firebase Push Notifications support for Convertigo mobile builder apps. { "url": "lib_PushManager_ui_ngx=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-push-manager-ui-ngx.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }
Imports the Convertigo OAuth library project. { "url": "lib_OAuth=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-oauth.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

Uses the Microsoft Excel connector for Convertigo platform. Install this library to enable reading from Microsoft Excel sheets on Office365 Cloud for your Convertigo applications. { "url": "lib_MicrosoftExcel_ui_ngx=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-excel-ui-ngx.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

Uses the geocoding library for Convertigo platform when network is reachable. Install this library to geocode coordinates for your Convertigo applications. It is based on Bing Maps location API. The shared component used in this library geocodes automatically browser's coordinates when network is reachable. { "url": "lib_Geocoding_ui_ngx=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-geocoding-ui-ngx.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }
Imports the Convertigo FullSync Groups library project. { "url": "lib_FullSyncGrp=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-fullsync-grp.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }
Imports the Convertigo FileTransfer library project. { "url": "lib_FileTransfer=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-filetransfer.git:branch=7.9.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

Set of shared components you can use in your projects: agGrid, ngxTagInput, angularxQRCode, CardIO, ZXing ... { "url": "lib_ExtendedComponents_ui_ngx=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-extended-components-ui-ngx.git:branch=8.1.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

Library for interacting with Amazon Lex Chatbots. This library Enables Convertigo to build conversational Apps for Mobile Web and Desktop Apps by interacting with Amazon's ChatBot Technology. { "url": "lib_AmazonLEX_ui_ngx=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-lib-amazonlex-ui-ngx.git:branch=8.0.0", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

Imports a project creating a sampleOffChat application. This application demonstrates FullSync technology used to an "Offline Chat" application. This app enables users to establish conversations between them and chat using text messages and photos. When the device is online, messages will flow from one to the other immediately, using FullSync “live” replications. If the device if offline, posts will be secured in the local FullSync NoSQL database and will be synced automatically when the device is online again. { "url": "sampleMobileOffChat=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-sample-offchat/archive/8.3.0.zip", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

Imports a project creating a sample_HelloWorld application. Simple news reader application using the Convertigo Mobile Builder. { "url": "sample_HelloWorld=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-sample-helloworld/archive/8.3.0.zip", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }

Imports a project creating a sampleRetailStore application. This application demonstrates FullSync technology used for a mobile retail store application where the user can browse a catalog of products downloaded on his mobile phone. For this demo, the data come from a static XML file imported in the FullSync server database. When the mobile application is launched, a first step will be done to import the data in the server database, then the data will be “synced” on the mobile device. Be sure to install a CouchDB server on your workstation before running this demo. { "url": "sampleMobileRetailStore=https://github.com/convertigo/c8oprj-sample-retailstore/archive/8.3.0.zip", "doPageSummarySampleProject": true }
